column2: * When a Servers IP Address changes after it has finished booting, i.e. if an IP address changes after the `HostInit Event`_.
* To reconfigure services that would depend on the IP Address of a Server (such as DNS service).

* SCALR_OLD_PUBLIC_IP: Public IP Address for this Server before the IP Address changed.* SCALR_OLD_PRIVATE_IP: Private IP Address for this Server before the IP Address changed.* SCALR_NEW_PUBLIC_IP: Public IP Address for this Server as a result of the change.* SCALR_NEW_PRIVATE_IP: Private IP Address for this Server as a result of the change.
